DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().details: Returns the domain separator used in the encoding of the signature for {permit}, as defined by {EIP712}.

params._dayUpdated: Day since inflation_day_zero to convert the demurrage values to inflationary values.
params._demurrageValues: Batch of demurrage values to convert to inflationary values.

params._day: Day since inflation_day_zero to convert the inflationary values to demurrage values.
params._inflationaryValues: Batch of inflationary values to convert to demurrage values.

params._dayUpdated: The day the demurrage value was last updated since inflation_day_zero
params._demurrageValue: Demurrage value to convert to inflationary value

params._day: Day since inflation_day_zero to convert the inflationary value to a demurrage value.
params._inflationaryValue: Inflationary value to convert to demurrage value.

params._timestamp: Timestamp for which to calculate the day since inflation_day_zero.

params._avatar: avatar address to convert to tokenId

totalSupply().details: Returns the value of tokens in existence.

convertBatchDemurrageToInflationaryValue.notice: Converts a batch of demurrage values to inflationary values for a given day since inflation_day_zero.

convertBatchInflationaryToDemurrageValue.notice: Converts a batch of inflationary values to demurrage values for a given day since inflation_day_zero.

convertDemurrageToInflationaryValue(uint.notice: Converts a demurrage value to an inflationary value for a given day since inflation_day_zero.

convertInflationaryToDemurrageValue(uint.notice: Converts an inflationary value to a demurrage value for a given day since inflation_day_zero.

day(uint256).notice: Calculate the day since inflation_day_zero for a given timestamp.

inflationDayZero().notice: Inflation day zero stores the start of the global inflation curve As Circles Hub v1 was deployed on Thursday 15th October 2020 at 6:25:30 pm UTC, or 1602786330 unix time, in production this value MUST be set to 1602720000 unix time, or midnight prior of the same day of deployment, marking the start of the first day where there was no inflation on one CRC per hour.

toTokenId(address).notice: Casts an avatar address to a tokenId uint256.
